block.p: Samantha Lauren Lerman, the daughter of Laura E. Lerman and Kenneth Lerman of Newtown, Conn., is to be married today to Dr. David Bruce Bernstein, a son of Gertrude Bernstein and Dr. Ralph Bernstein of Suffern, N.Y. Rabbi Bernard Schecter will officiate at the Heritage Inn in Southbury, Conn.

The bride, 26, is a nursing student at Simmons College in Boston. She graduated from the University of Colorado. Her father is a software engineer at Sycamore Networks, a fiber optic network company, in Wallingford, Conn., and also works as a software consultant. Her mother is a senior recruiter at Task Management, a placement agency for computer professionals, in Ridgefield, Conn.

The bridegroom, 32, is a chief resident in anesthesia and critical care at Massachusetts General Hospital in Boston. He graduated from Johns Hopkins University and received his medical degree from Mount Sinai School of Medicine in New York. His father retired as the chairman of the anesthesia department at the Hospital for Joint Diseases in New York.
